revised_prompt: Design a professional banner advert which features the text in this hierarchy: 'Brand' as the largest, boldest element at the top or center, '70% Off' in a medium size at the center, and 'Learn More' prominently positioned on a vibrant button at the bottom or in another noticeable position. The layout should be simple, uncluttered, and text-centric, with high contrast between the text and the clean or subtly patterned background. The overall design must entail a clean, modern, and professional advertising feel, with eye-catching, vibrant colors, all encased in the dimensions of 1200x628 pixels. The typography should be in sans-serif fonts for high legibility.
